attributes.action: lead those that hold international influence in helping to bring justice to the people of Zimbabwe by taking appropriate and neccesary action to bring to an end the humanitarian and economic crisis that exists in the Republic of Zimbabwe.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the recent elections in Zimbabwe and the process of ballot counting being less than transparent, it is clear that regardless of the victor in the presidential and parliamentary vote, Zimbabwe has a long way to go before it can return to stability and we emplore Mr Brown and his government to lend help to the people of Zimbabwe to reach this goal.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
